imdb.plot outline: Born of capitalism, a brother enemy of state communism, anarchism has never stopped blowing its wind of justice and freedom on the world. And if some libertarians were able to turn themselves into criminals, revolvers or dynamite, we forget that many were able to propose alternatives and initiate the great revolutions of the twentieth century. From unpublished archive footage, forgotten documents, exclusive interviews with leading workers' movement specialists, this exceptional film tells for the first time the history of this movement which has been fighting for over 150 years Masters and gods and who, from Paris to New York and from Tokyo to Buenos Aires, never ceases to make the world tremble.
imdb.title: Ni dieu, ni maître. Une histoire de l'anarchisme
plot: "Ni Dieu Ni Maître" reviews all the great events of the social history of the last two centuries and reveals the origin and destiny of this political current that has been fighting for over 150 years all masters and gods.

Born of capitalism, a brother enemy of state communism, anarchism has never stopped blowing its wind of justice and freedom on the world. And if some libertarians were able to turn themselves into criminals, revolvers or dynamite, we forget that many were able to propose alternatives and initiate the great revolutions of the twentieth century. From unpublished archive footage, forgotten documents, exclusive interviews with leading workers' movement specialists, this exceptional film tells for the first time the history of this movement which has been fighting for over 150 years Masters and gods and who, from Paris to New York and from Tokyo to Buenos Aires, never ceases to make the world tremble.
